pkgmetadata.longdescription: International Classifcation of Diseases (ICD) Data // Data from the United States Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) is included in this package. There are ICD-9 and ICD-10 diagnostic and procedure codes, and lists of the chapter and sub-chapter headings and the ranges of ICD codes they encompass. There are also two sample datasets. These data are used by the 'icd' package for finding comorbidities.
